post.description: Uploads file to the server and returns a unique ID that represents this file. Attach this unique ID to requests to claim this file. Unclaimed files will be removed after 1 hour

id.description: unique id created by the server

post.description: Create a zip file from given file URIs and returns the URI for that zip file. Unauthorized or non-existing files will be skipped.

get.description:
At least one `selection filter` must be provided. `selection filter` operators:
	 * 			within
	 * 			contains
	 * 			touches
	 * 			intersects
	 * 			disjoint


Some operators may not be supported by some of the selection types. Each selection type has it's default operator and this operator will be used if operator information is omitted. Default operators:
	 * 			Polygon -> within
	 * 			Circular -> within
	 * 			Line -> intersects
	 
	 
Valid filter examples:
	 *			filter[selection]={"type":"Point","coordinates":[28.878187,41.015658]} - VERIFIED
	 *			filter[selection]={"type":"Circle","properties":{"radius":443.0003055263856},"geometry":{"type":"Point","coordinates":[-74.008317,40.72251],"radius":443.0003055263856}}
	 *			filter[selection][within]={"type":"Polygon","coordinates":[[[41.0426187750078,28.8687407636496],[41.0425359612035,28.868791166567],[41.042584847112,28.86892701616],[41.0426660047092,28.8688753006536],[41.0426187750078,28.8687407636496]]]}
	 *			filter[selection][disjoint][]={"type":"Polygon","coordinates":[[[41.0426187750078,28.8687407636496],[41.0425359612035,28.868791166567],[41.042584847112,28.86892701616],[41.0426660047092,28.8688753006536],[41.0426187750078,28.8687407636496]]]}
	 *			filter[selection][disjoint][]={"type":"Polygon","coordinates":[[[41.0424555102178,28.8688470131439],[41.0423746461538,28.8688962286338],[41.042417608399,28.8690312122945],[41.0425006716229,28.8689797760648],[41.0424555102178,28.8688470131439]]]}

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: column. Defaults to: `0 if z is 1` | `1 if z is 2` | `4 if z is 3`

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: row. Defaults to: `0 if z is 1` | `1 if z is 2` | `4 if z is 3`

schema.description: `1 = Yapı Ruhsat Belgesi`, `2 = Yapı Kullanma İzni Belgesi`, `3 = Yanan ve Yıkılan Belgesi`

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: column. Defaults to: `0 if z is 1` | `1 if z is 2` | `4 if z is 3`

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: row. Defaults to: `0 if z is 1` | `1 if z is 2` | `4 if z is 3`

data.description:
* 					Depending on the event type, this object will contain following properties: 
 * 					`type == 1` => `{ status_old: int, status_new: int }`,
 * 					`type == 2` => `{ title_old: string, title_new: string }`,
 * 					`type == 3` => `{ assignee: int }`,
 * 					`type == 4` => `{ assignee: int }`,
 * 					`type == 5` => `{ description: string }`,
 * 					`type == 6` => `{ due_date_old: string(datetime), due_date_new: string(datetime) }`,
 * 					`type == 7` => `{ title: string }`,
 * 					`type == 8` => `{ title: string }`,
 * 					`type == 10` => `{ priority_old: int, priority_new: int }`,
 * 					`type == 11` => `{ location: { latitude: string, longitude: string } }`,
 * 					`type == 12` => `{ name: string }`,
 * 					`type == 13` => `{ name: string }`,
 * 					`type == 14` => `{ start_date_old: string(datetime), start_date_new: string(datetime) }`
 *

enabler.description: NULL if event was triggered by the system

uploader.description: NULL if attachment was added by the system

procedure_type.description:
* 			`(Numarataj) Numbering = 1`
 *			`(Yapı Ruhsatı) BuildingPermit = 2`
 *			`(İnşaat İstikamet Rölevesi) ConstructionDirectionSurveying = 3`
 *			`(Kot Kesit Rölevesi) ElevationProfileSurveying = 4`
 *			`(Yola Terk) Expropriation = 5`
 *			`(İfraz) Parcelling = 6`
 *			`(Tevhit) Amalgamation = 7`
 *			`(Ecrimisil) OccupationCompensationByManagement = 8`
 *			`(Ecrimisil - Vatandaş) OccupationCompensationByCitizen = 9`
 *			`(1/5000 Ölçekli Plan Değişimi) PlanChange1to5000Internal = 10`
 *			`(1/5000 Ölçekli Plan Değişimi - Vatandaş) PlanChange1to5000External = 11`
 *			`(Yıkım Ruhsatı) DeconstructionPermit = 12`
 *			`(Avan Proje) PreliminaryDesign = 13`
 *			`(Yazılı İmar Durumu) WrittenZoningStatus = 14`
 *			`Riskli Yapı = 15`
 *			`Kira Yardımı (Mal Sahibi) = 16`
 *			`Kira Yardımı (Kiracı) = 17`
 *			`Test = 18`

uploader.description: NULL if attachment was added by the system
NULL if attachment was added by the system

parcel_tag_type.description:
Use dot as delimiter to specify subtags. ex: `imar_plani_surecinde`, `imar_plani_surecinde.hazirlik_asamasinda`, `belediye_mulku.kiraya_verilen.bina`. All possible values are as follows:
 * 		
 		[
			'imar_plani_surecinde' => [
				'hazirlik_asamasinda',
				'kurum_gorusu_asamasinda',
				'meclis_karari_asamasinda',
				'onay_dagitim_asamasinda',
				'aski_ilan_asamasinda',
				'itiraz_surecinde',
				'dava_surecinde'
			],
			'yeni_yapi' => [
				'on_proje_asamasinda',
				'ruhsat_asamasinda',
				'yapim_asamasinda',
				'iskan_asamasinda'
			],
			'riskli_yapi' => [
				'1999_deprem_hasarli',
				'2000_deprem_hasarli',
				'resen_islem_yapilan',
				'ilgililerince_islem_yapilan',
				'tahliye_edilip_yikilan'
			],
			'belediye_mulku' => [
				'belediyece_kullanilan' => [
					'bina',
					'arsa'
				],
				'kiraya_verilen' => [
					'bina',
					'arsa'
				],
				'tahsis_edilen' => [
					'bina',
					'arsa'
				]
			],
			'ecrimisil' => [],
			'belediyeye_tahsis_edilen_mulk' => [
				'bina',
				'arsa'
			],
			'belediyeye_kiralanan_mulk' => [
				'bina',
				'arsa'
			],
			'kamulastirmaya_konu_mulk' => [],
			'hasarli_bina' => [
				'bosaltilan' => [],
				'bosaltilamayan' => [],
				'deprem_1999' => []
			]
			]
